body: Can't trivially get rid of recursion here, since it's a non-linear recursive function. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1140)

commit.message:
Clean up `add_to_list` function a bit.

Can't trivially get rid of recursion here, since it's a non-linear
recursive function.
